channel.title: IP Ban?
channel.description: why is my ip ban from the official server? i was playing yesterday and fell in a hole by spawn and i couldnt get out b/c the blocks kept spawning back. i havent broke any rules so wtf. i got up this morning and was like yes the server is up and running and ready for me to build. i try to log in bam your ip has been ban from this server. not a very good way to start the day.

item.title: IP Ban?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
